content: a2 and then work sts 3-32 3-36 of chart a1 17 times ssk turn a2 for the same row row 4 ws sl1 p29 p33 p2tog turn work sts on both needles according to chart a1 a2 repeating row 12-35 as many times row 5 rs *sl1 k1* repeat * - * until 1 st as desired finish the stranded colourwork remains before the gap ssk turn either with row 35 or work chart a1 a2 row 36-47 after the last repeat of row 12- row 6 ws sl1 purl until 1 st remains before 35 the gap p2tog turn cut cc yarn and switch to smaller needles if repeat row 5 and 6 until 1 unworked stitch desired knit one round with mc remains on the left side of the heel flap 1 unworked and 1 wrapped stitch remains on with mc work *k1tbl p1* ribbing for 12 16 the right side of the heel flap and you have rnds or to desired ribbing length bind off just finished row 6 finally work row 5 once using any stretchy bind-off method of your more but do not turn choice sewn bind-off has been used for the sample socks shown in the photos finishing soak the socks in lukewarm water remove excess water by rolling the socks in a towel let dry flat or on sock blockers weave in ends valtiatar socks page 3/7 abbreviations bor - beginning of round cc - contrast colour k - knit kfb - knit front and back loop ktbl - knit through the back loop k2tog - knit 2 stitches together ll1 - lifted left increase do not knit/purl any sts but only work the increase element of the stitch mc - main colour m1 2 - stitch marker 1 2 m1l - make 1 left a left leaning increase m1r - make 1 right a right leaning increase p - purl p2tog - purl 2 stitches together round s - round s rs - right side sl - slip ssk - slip slip knit st s - stitch es ws - wrong side w&t - wrap and turn video tutorials for the techniques l ifted left increase knitwise https //www youtube com/watch v=ffcjg7mezh0 lifted left increase purlwise https //www youtube com/watch v=grbyxkc3pvc r s knitted shadow wraps https //www youtube com/watch v=u3xzz5n9kpy ws purled shadow wraps https //www youtube com/watch v=ckztlhcqhyw m 1r knitwise https //www youtube com/watch v=gz40vvswl5a m1l knitwise https //www youtube com/watch v=pdzasvi9_sc w rap and turn purlwise https //www youtube com/watch v=etekehniphw valtiatar socks page 4/7 chart a1 size s instep / leg chart key chart b1 size s sole valtiatar socks page 5/7 chart a2 size m instep / leg chart b1 size m sole valtiatar socks page 6/7 chart c both sizes gusset chart key valtiatar socks page 7/7
